long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An educational extension for helping students study with the use of AI. It allows users to select text or take a screenshot to ask questions about any material.

The extension uses AI to provide responses to the questions and display it on the website.
